skill.name: senior-backend
skill.description: Comprehensive backend development skill for building scalable backend systems using NodeJS, Express, Go, Python, Postgres, GraphQL, REST APIs. Includes API scaffolding, database optimization, security implementation, and performance tuning. Use when designing APIs, optimizing database queries, implementing business logic, handling authentication/authorization, or reviewing backend code.
skill.summary: Comprehensive backend development skill for building scalable backend systems using NodeJS, Express,...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate backend development toolkit. The three Python scripts are skeleton templates that validate paths and generate reports. No network calls, no credential access, and no external command execution detected. Filesystem access is limited to user-specified directories.

content.value_statement: Building robust backend systems requires deep expertise in API design, database optimization, and security implementation. This skill provides comprehensive guidance and automated tools for creating production-ready backend services.
actual_capabilities: Design REST APIs and GraphQL schemas following best practices
Optimize database queries and implement efficient schemas
Apply security best practices for backend systems
Use provided Python scripts for API scaffolding and analysis
Review and improve backend code quality
limitations: Does not execute code or modify user projects automatically
Scripts are templates that require customization
Does not provision cloud infrastructure or databases
Requires user to implement recommendations manually

use_cases.title: Design REST APIs
use_cases.description: Create well-structured REST APIs with proper error handling and validation using established patterns.

use_cases.title: Optimize Database Queries
use_cases.description: Improve database performance through query optimization and schema design recommendations.

use_cases.title: Implement Security
use_cases.description: Apply security best practices including authentication, authorization, and input validation.

prompt_templates.title: API Design
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating a new REST API endpoint
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a REST API endpoint for [resource] with proper validation, error handling, and follow best practices from the senior-backend skill. Include request/response schemas and status codes.

prompt_templates.title: Database Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze and optimize the following database queries for performance. Apply indexing strategies and query patterns recommended in the senior-backend skill documentation.

prompt_templates.title: Security Implementation
prompt_templates.prompt: Implement secure authentication and authorization for my API endpoints. Use industry best practices from the senior-backend skill for JWT handling and permission checks.

prompt_templates.title: Code Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my backend code for security vulnerabilities, performance issues, and adherence to best practices. Reference the senior-backend skill patterns for improvements.

output_examples.input: Design a user authentication API with JWT tokens
output: Use stateless JWT authentication with secure token handling
Implement refresh token rotation and storage
Add rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks
Validate all inputs on registration and login endpoints
Store password hashes using bcrypt with appropriate work factor
Return appropriate HTTP status codes for success and errors

best_practices: Validate all user inputs and sanitize data before processing
Use parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection attacks
Implement proper error handling without exposing internal details
Use environment variables for configuration and secrets
anti_patterns: Storing credentials or secrets directly in source code
Executing dynamic SQL queries without parameterization
Returning detailed error messages that expose internals
Skipping input validation on API endpoints

faq.question: Which programming languages are supported?
faq.answer: Node.js, Express, Python, Go, TypeScript, Java, and other common backend languages.

faq.question: What databases can I optimize?
faq.answer: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Prisma, NeonDB, Supabase, and other SQL and NoSQL databases.

faq.question: How do the Python scripts work?
faq.answer: The scripts validate target directories and generate reports. They serve as templates for customization.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. Scripts only access user-specified directories and do not transmit data externally.

faq.question: How to troubleshoot script issues?
faq.answer: Run scripts with --verbose flag for detailed output. Check target path permissions and ensure Python 3 is installed.

faq.question: How is this different from other backend skills?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on senior-level architecture decisions, security patterns, and comprehensive optimization strategies.
